entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed 'regArgTab[argNum].slot == 2' #83167
  • Ensure that the ref/*.cs files are consistent with what tooling produces #83166
  • Nested classes in System.Runtime.Intrinsics are missing xml doc comments #83165
  • Some hardware intrinsic ILLInk.Substitution entries may be unnecessary #83164
  • Blazor WebAssembly dotnet 8 Preview 1 with AOT Crashes on Safari on iOS #83161
  • [API Proposal]: Json多态类型处理器，未知类型处理建议 #83160
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlock.ReceiveAsync does not use custom scheduler #83159
  • TraceSwitch can have inconsistent internal state #83153
  • JIT: Missing normalize-on-load for small-typed arg live across EH #83149
    8.0.0
  • The foreground color of the standard error output of console applications may not change. #83146
  • PerfView cannot attribute symbols to write barrier #83145
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableArray.CreateUnsafe<T>(T[] array) #83141
    Future
  • [Fuzzlyn] x86 test failure involving field and division #83140
    8.0.0
  • ProcessTests.Test[Peak]WorkingSet[64] fail on Fedora 39 #83129
  • Should System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.HasClaim perform case sensitive match for claim type? #83128
  • NativeRuntimeEventSource generates a large manifest that is never used #83127
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add FileAttributes.None #83125
  • Local clean build failure while linking `Corehost.static\singlefilehost.exe` #83123
  • [JIT] Possible AltJit assertion when alt-jitting ARM64 #83119

Closed

  • [wasm][debugger] Multiple tests failing on rolling builds on Windows #81792
    8.0.0
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE for each thread to createdump dumps #40958
    6.0.x
  • Array.cs performs an Unsafe.As cast that is an undefined behaviour #83115
  • [API Proposal]: `Unsafe.BitCast` for efficient type reinterpretation #81334
  • [API Proposal]: Add ConsoleModifiers.None and ConsoleKey.None #79868
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Incorrect target method resolution in ldvirtftn+delegate creation #83003
  • System.Text.Json: The converter for derived type 'T' does not support metadata writes or reads. #83148
  • Bug in Configuration Binder 7.0.3 #82998
    7.0.x
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute in ProcessStartInfo and Process implementation on Windows #81681
    Future
  • Port 'Restrict named mutex files permissions' pull to current stable release #83133
  • Workaround broken Mono System.Drawing facades #82829
    8.0.0
  • Default constructor trimmed for generic argument #81720
  • Deserialization of classes with parametrized ctor is failing depending on number of arguments #83131
  • Clarification on NuGet versioning with regards to supported SDK/runtime #82225
    Future
  • JIT: Allow comparing GC pointers with `ccmp` #82703
  • Evaluate changing ValueTask to have two reference fields instead of one #55891
    Future
  • Native AOT debug info broken on MacOS #83038
    8.0.0
  • Arm64: Support containment of immediates for Vector<T> #31693
    Future
  • [NativeAOT/osx-arm64] Warnings publishing classlib with `StripSymbols=true` #80934
  • Improve gRPC support on mobile platforms #69095
    8.0.0
  • [Windows|Arm64] init-tools.cmd supports native dotnet cli #10946
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Call `FlushInstructionCache` in CFG test #83168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [workloads] Add win-arm64 to wasm-tools in the net6 manifest #83162
    area-Build-mono
  • Rename ManagedVirtualMethodTable and adjust indices #83158
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • ignore expiration in NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test #83157
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling of required & init-only properties with custom property names in source gen. #83147
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix EQ/NE(relop/SETCC, 0) optimization #83144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test merging baseservices/threading #83143
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/7.0] Add more type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to mscorlib.dll and System.Drawing.Common.dll #83137
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add tar tests to confirm entries owned by deleted users can still be read or written #83126
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Swap order of OnError in FileSystemWatcher.ReadDirectoryChangesCallback on Windows #83121
    area-System.IO
  • Add new MemoryExtension.Replace(src, dst, ...) overload #83120
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change execution order conditions for intellisense swapping and copying msbuild targets. #83117
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Ensure that the new Vector512 related ISAs are covered by ILLink Substitutions #83040
    linkable-framework
  • Refactoring GenTreeVecCon to support TYP_SIMD64 #83053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use libc directly for math in the jiterpreter, implement more opcodes #82963
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Partially revert #82604 #83156
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fix undefined behaviour in Array.cs #83116
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.BitCast #82917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Lowering subset of Vector512 methods for avx512. #82953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Revert to using latest chrome for testing #83150
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Add tests for build with SIMD disabled #82845
    area-Build-mono
  • Add ConsoleKey.None and ConsoleModifiers.None #83114
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement parity for RAF and RDC attributes in NativeAOT #83085
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #83060
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix pthread_cond_wait race on macOS #82893
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.5
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute #82662
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #83059
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix asset counting after download retry #82617
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.5
  • Change a few more Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes to u8 in json #83138
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Clean up some code in SmtpDateTime #83142
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82082
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • Update SourceBuild image to be our Centos 8 Stream image. #83106
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82433
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 6.0.16
  • [mono] Fix virtual method resolution in mono_delegate_trampoline (). #83004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82322
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Use latest sdk 7.0 sdk for workload testing, and perf runs #82219
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Backport UsingMobileWorkload change #82268
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: fix graph not being updated on pack. #82851
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82323
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Minor tweaks to IndexOfAnyLookupCore #83139
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Fixes to enable more tests #82966
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Add wasm support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #83122
  • [mono][arm64] Implement delegate virtual invoke trampolines. #83028
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Don't try to do devirt for Delegate.Invoke (). #83026
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Add type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to System.Drawing.Common.dll #82839
    area-System.Drawing
  • Implement correct handling of new constraint in ilc #82818
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - managed #82826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support converting OR(condition, condition) -> CCMP #83089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use MsQuic 2.1 again #83124
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser] cleanup before memory snapshot #83082
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [7.0] Fix superpmi_collect-setup.py helix images to use floating versions instead #83100
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 7.0.5 #83103
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.16 #83102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rename cgroup.cpp to cgroupcpu.cpp #83029
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BLK and TYP_LCLBLK #83036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Remove fragile NGen logic for precomputed hashcodes #82563
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82854
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Support new feature on browser: instrumentation pause #82855
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.x
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Fix PAX extended attribute reading logic to treat '=' character as valid in the value strings. #82810
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Clean up the delegate info code #83030
    NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Backport #82480 (fix third argument to TypedArray.fill) #82572
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [runtime/6.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83079
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [runtime/7.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83078
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82805
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Port #82470 (disable EventPipe stack collection with environment variable) to 7.0 #82921
    Servicing-consider, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82432
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Host, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/7.0] Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.5
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Prevent use of null when processing ALPN list #81797
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82210
    area-Host, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [6.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82248
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.16
  • [7.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82246
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.5
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable folding small-typed returned indirections #82846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82934
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [7.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82554
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82562
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #81722
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Adding more arm64 SIMD operations, SIMD codegen with instruction table. #83094
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Make area-owners.json true source for all area like labels dependencies #82534
    needs-author-action
  • Stress testing gtSplitTree #83005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsics for BitOperations #82827
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • update alpine test images #82931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
